Even today, when a young adult goes to psychotherapy, the majority of psychotherapists will follow a line of investigation rooted in a century of Freudian influence. What was your childhood like? What was your relationship with your parents? The parents will be found to be absent, or overinvolved; cold, or smothering; hostile, or seductive; too permissive, or helicopter pilots.
